By No name on Friday, May 10, 2002 - 06:08 pm:

well, stragetically, speed does make sense, as it's the most dificult stat to counter. some breeds CAN'T counter it. the only way for them to win is luck. POW and/or INT for LIF and/or DEF and vise versa. however, speed is exclude out of that, as the only thing that really determines weather or not you hit them is HIT for a move, which you can raise a limited amount, and sometimes not at all. and some breeds don't have any accurate moves! which is annoying...
